short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension allowing downloading AO3 and Fanfiction.net fanfics straight to your Kindle

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can download fanfics from Archive Of Our Own (AO3) directly to your Kindle device (or any email address)
